      • HandleSingleSong

        public void HandleSingleSong(java.lang.String csvFilePath)
                      throws java.io.IOException,
                             javax.sound.sampled.UnsupportedAudioFileException
        Handles Feature Extraction for one Song. Opens a java Swing window for file navigation.
        Parameters:
        csvFilePath - the path to save the csv file, for output.
        Throws:
        javax.sound.sampled.UnsupportedAudioFileException - throws this if the audio file format is not supported by FFMPEG.
        java.io.IOException - throws this error if error happens during output saving or audio file reading.

      • HandleSingleSong

        public void HandleSingleSong(java.lang.String csvFilePath,
                    java.lang.String audioFilePath)
                      throws java.io.IOException,
                             javax.sound.sampled.UnsupportedAudioFileException
        Handles Feature Extraction for one Song. If the file path can be provided thought code.
        Parameters:
        csvFilePath - the path to save the csv file, for output.
        audioFilePath - the audio file to extract features from.
        Throws:
        javax.sound.sampled.UnsupportedAudioFileException - throws this if the audio file format is not supported by FFMPEG.
        java.io.IOException - throws this error if error happens during output saving or audio file reading.

      • HandleMultipleSongs

        public void HandleMultipleSongs(java.lang.String csvFilePath,
                       java.lang.String directoryName)
                         throws java.io.IOException,
                                javax.sound.sampled.UnsupportedAudioFileException
        Handles Feature Extraction for multiple songs. This is for Test data generation, rather than classification. Needs to be provided an absolute path to a directory to work from.
        Parameters:
        csvFilePath - the path to save the csv file, for output.
        directoryName - the path from which songs are collected.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        javax.sound.sampled.UnsupportedAudioFileException

      • generateARFFFile

        public void generateARFFFile(java.lang.String csvFile,
                    java.lang.String arffFile)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        This method will take in a CSV file and export an ARFF file, which is the preferred type for WEKA.
        Parameters:
        csvFile - location to source CSV file.
        arffFile - path to save location for ARFF file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Error in Reading or Saving of file.
